conversation: Hello!
Oh, hello. You must be __player__.
Yes, that's me. Who are you?
I'm Didara. Plastics. Nice to meet you.
Nice to meet you! Plastics? That sounds interesting, what can you do for me?
I can get you any kind of material you need that is based around plastics or rubber, and if you need recycled plastic and rubber products I can probably find you some.
Nice! That will come in handy.
So, why are you all alone over in the work area?
Well, I'm not really good at, y'know, social stuff. So I just try to avoid it when I can.

options.text: Oh come on! It's important to know your team mates.
Oh, I see.

conversation: Oh come on! It's important to know your teammates. Why don't you go over to the commons area and join the meet-and-greet. I'm sure it will be fun if you just get there.
I'd really rather not.
Oh boy, you're one of those people I'll have to poke for everything, eh? Well, introverts, can't be helped I guess.
No, I do my job just fine. I just don't like being pushed into things I'm uncomfortable with.
Fine. I'll leave you lonelier be then.
See you later.

options.text: __callback__

conversation: Oh, I see. Well, if you are uncomfortable then you shouldn't push yourself. Is there anything I could bring you from the meet-and-greet?!
Oh! No, thank you, but I appreciate it!
Okay. I'm looking forward to working with you! And please don't be shy if you want to talk to me.
Thank you. I'll try to remember that.
Have a great evening then. See you!
See you later!

options.text: __callback__

conversation: Hi, Didara. I'm thinking on how to best build the walls. Any input?
Well, tires are a good option. They hold up for a long time and it's recycling
Yeah, I read that on the draft board.
I think it was called an 'Earth Ship', sounds nice.
It would be. Nearly indestructible, low repair costs, low building costs.
Environmentally friendly, too, and very versatile in design. Some of the ones I've seen are beautiful!
Have a great evening then. See you!
See you later!

options.text: Those are some amazing points. I think that might be what we need to make this project the environmental success it has to be to safe humanity.
I'm not so sure if that is really going to work so well. Maybe I should ask the others first.

conversation: Those are some amazing points. I think that might be what we need to make this project the environmental success it has to be to safe humanity.
Definitely! Do you want me to start sourcing tires?

options.text: Yes, please do. You are amazing, thank you!
Let me talk to the others first, but thank you.

conversation: You're very welcome! I can't wait to see what you come up with!

options.text: __callback__

conversation: I'm not so sure if that is really going to work so well. Maybe I should ask the others first.
Oh. Well, you do what you think is best. If you have any questions, though, I'm happy to help.
Okay, I'll be going then.

options.text: __callback__

conversation: Hi, Didara. How about we just talk a little bit with each other? Tell me something about yourself.
Um... I'm from Nigeria. I work with plastics. I like Doctor Who. I'm not sure what else you want to know..

options.text: Oh, I forgot that you are shy. Sorry to put you on the spot there. I just thought it would be nice to know you better as a person, not just a colleague
No reason to be shy. I just want to know you better.

conversation: Oh, I forgot that you are shy. Sorry to put you on the spot there. I just thought it would be nice to know you better as a person, not just a colleague.
Oh. Well... you could watch some Doctor Who with me if you want, as soon as I finish up this project.

options.text: That sounds really nice, let me make some popcorn while you finish up.
Hey, how about I introduce you to one of my favorite shows?

conversation: That sounds really nice, let me make some popcorn while you finish up.
Awesome! Won't be more than a few minutes!

options.text: __callback__

conversation: Hey, how about I introduce you to one of my favorite shows?
Maybe. How about I watch one episode of your show and you watch one of mine?
Sure! That's sounds like a great way to learn something about each other. I'll grab my show and some popcorn.
Great! I'll finish up and meet you in the common area.

options.text: __callback__

conversation: No reason to be shy. I just want to know you better.
Maybe I just know what I like.
Heh? What is that supposed to mean?.
I see no reason to waste my time on something that will bore me.
Woah, woah, okay. Man, I was just trying to be nice. Good team-mates and all, but I guess I should just leave you alone, working.
Yep. I have a ton of stuff to do.

options.text: Oh, am I overworking you? Sorry, that wasn't my intention.
Well, I have a ton of stuff to do, too, and obviously getting to know my team mates better isn't on the list in your opinion.

conversation: Oh, am I overworking you? Sorry, that wasn't my intention.
What? Oh. No, it's just a lot of chasing down vendors and doing paperwork.
You said you have a ton of stuff to do, and since I am the one setting the work tasks I was just worried for a moment there. But it seems that I upset you, sorry, I'll leave.
Oh. I didn't mean it like that. Just that I prefer to use my free time on things I know I'll like.
Well, all I asked was if you would be willing share those things, but it seems we are talking past each other today.
I... Oh. I must have misunderstood. Sorry.
It's okay, happens sometimes. I probably better leave before we get tangled even worse. See you.
Ok.

options.text: __callback__

conversation: Well, I have a ton of stuff to do, too, and obviously getting to know my team mates better isn't on the list in your opinion.
Apparently not.
Fine. Bye.

options.text: __callback__

conversation: Hey, guess who got you a special edition Dr. Who pair of sonic sun glasses?
WHAT?? Are you serious?

options.text: Well, I could see how much you enjoy the show and thought you might like them.
I just thought it would be a good way to say sorry for last time. We seemed to have gotten into each other’s hair pretty bad, and we are all on the same team. So, yeah, sorry.

conversation: Well, I could see how much you enjoy the show and thought you might like them.
Wow! That's amazing! Thank you so much!

options.text: Come on, put them on. Let's see what features they have
Come on, put them on. I'm sure you will look gorgeous with them

conversation: Come on, put them on. Let's see what features they have
Ok! Oh, look at this! And this! What does this do? Ooh!
I've heard they do something when you watch certain episodes, so, Marathon after work today?
Absolutely! This is so great!

options.text: __callback__

conversation: Come on, put them on. I'm sure you will look gorgeous with them
Oh! Um... ok... Hey, look, it does this really cool thing!
Wow that is nice! I've heard they do stuff when you watch specific episodes. So, do you maybe want to come watch a season with me... over in my room?
I... would love to, actually.
Yes! Ahem, I mean, great, let's do that after work today. See you then, Didara.
I look forward to it.

options.text: __callback__

conversation: I just thought it would be a good way to say sorry for last time. We seemed to have gotten into each other’s hair pretty bad, and we are all on the same team. So, yeah, sorry.
Oh! Well, thank you. And I'm sorry I got upset.

options.text: I'm sorry for being upset, too. Let's just see that we avoid that from now on, okay?
Well, we need to manage to work together, so let's just make the best out of it.

conversation: I'm sorry for being upset, too. Let's just see that we avoid that from now on, okay?
Sure. And thanks again.
Okay, I'll get back to work then. See you.
See you later.
